statusEffect.name: feminine fertility
statusEffect.description:
After consuming a bottle of 'Amazon's Secret', [npc.nameIsFull] able to impregnate [npc.her] sexual partners by orgasming while #IF(npc.isPlayer())your#ELSEtheir#ENDIF pussies are touching.
[style.italicsPinkLight(Fertility is used instead of virility for calculating impregnation chance in this manner.)]

extraEffects.effect: [style.colourSex(Can impregnate partners via orgasmic vaginal contact!)]
